name: dRoll Dungeon
description:
Roll the dice and design your own dungeon! Defeat incoming adventurers and become renowned as the land's toughest, meanest boss!

All of the artwork was created on paper, using a pen, colored pencils, and watercolor. They were then photographed with a Samsung Galaxy M62 and used as textures for 3D models created with Blender.

Unfortunately, we weren't able to get as much programming done this time. The game is unfinished, but you can play around with the dungeon editor :)

If you enjoyed the artwork know that we're going to send a complete version after the voting period ends, so please stay tuned for that!😊

Controls:
- Press the Spacebar to close dialog boxes.

- Use the Left Mouse Button to select and move pieces around.

- Use the Right Mouse Button to rotate floor pieces.

Credits:

- Gabriel Naves: Programming, game design, and 3D modeling.

- Kaio Henrique: Artwork and game design.
